title: Regulations for planning areas of growth centres at sector – R - i
clause_text: Regulations for planning areas of growth centres at sector – R - i.e. i) Lonavala – Karla - Malvali And ii) Kune – Pangaloli - Kurwande and surrounded area which is a part of Pune Metropolitan Development Authority area, shall be as per the following Regulations.
section: 1.0 LAND USE CLASSIFICATION AND PERMISSIBLE USES

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
